title: Buff anti heal
body: With the new conq, anti heal is useless please buff anti heal

replies.body: Agree but not too much because champs like vlad, renek, mundo so op. Also conquer getting gutted next patch

> [{quoted}](name=RedOpticToxin,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=Fd457kv8,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2019-12-09T06:15:44.480+0000)
>
> Agree but not too much because champs like vlad, renek, mundo so op. Also conquer getting gutted next patch

Conq gets gutted every patch. What like 50 nerfs in a row? Riot should just remove the keystone and admit they made a mistake.

> Also conquer getting gutted next patch

The cycle of life and death continues.

{{champion:266}} Aatrox + Death Dance + Spirit Visage and i cant heal my self because of grievous wounds don't buff anti-heal items :(
just nerf ravenous hunter and taste of blood
And give AP a low cost heal reduction item … i just played sylas top against aatrox and i would have  liked to have some heal reduction^^
